Body:
Q = 1
kernel = gpflow.kernels.SquaredExponential()
inducing_variable = np.linspace(0, 1, Data.M)[:, (None)]
m = gpflow.models.BayesianGPLVM(Data.Y, np.zeros((Data.N, Q)), np.ones((
    Data.N, Q)), kernel, inducing_variable=inducing_variable)
assert len(m.inducing_variable) == Data.M
elbo_initial = m.elbo()
opt = gpflow.optimizers.Scipy()
opt.minimize(m.training_loss, m.trainable_variables, options=dict(maxiter=2))
assert m.elbo() > elbo_initial
